Canaries, and where the best 100 postgraduates of this country will congregate together with a group of scientifics,
researchers, professionals, Nobel Price winners and other distinguished members of the International Scientific
Society."
Provable tasks: Extract from http://www.campusdeexcelencia.info/index.php "The object of this Campus is to
make relevant personalities in the fields of Science, Economy, Culture and World Politics, get into contact with
recent postgraduates in a relaxed atmosphere where students can meet experts who will help them to guide
their future. Furthermore, the sponsoring companies will have the unique opportunity of meeting brilliant newly
postgraduates which can be included in their future plans of expansion."
Aims of the stay: Doctorate
